item.description:
No Stress Allowed Yoga in Onset

It was relaxing yet a workout. I can't wait for more.

Ongoing / Open Class
Four weeks for $40 or $13 per class

For questions or to register call Cheryl at 508-295-1126

I've done Tai Chi before and I got the same result which for someone who always lifted weights for a workout just seems impossible. I had a good stretch, with strength training, I was tired, but soooooo relaxed... I understand how it works but it just seems impossible. I love it !

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Yoga Wednesdays
